title: 3.4 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a program for the following project:

Add two button sprites and one keyboard sprite. When one of the button sprites is clicked, the keyboard sprite should play a tune of a piano. When the second button is pressed, the keyboard sprite should play the tune of a flute.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
